text: Allianz Technology Trust () is a large British investment trust dedicated to investments in technology companies. Established in 1995, the company is a constituent of the FTSE 250 Index. The chairman is Robert Jeens. Allianz Technology Trust was named Best Technology Trust by ADVFN for 2020. ==References== ==External links== * Official site Category:Financial services companies established in 1995 Category:Investment trusts of the United Kingdom
title: Allianz Technology Trust
